body:
### Environment

Node version: v20.10.0
npm version: 10.2.3
Local ESLint version: 9.0.0
Global ESLint version: n/a
Operating System: macOS 14.4.1 (23E224)


### What parser are you using?

Default (Espree)

### What did you do?

I read the [v9 migration doc](https://eslint.org/docs/latest/use/migrate-to-9.0.0) and [flat config rollout plans](https://eslint.org/blog/2023/10/flat-config-rollout-plans/); nothing mentioned keeping eslint config in the `package.json` `eslintConfig` property.

When upgrading to v9 with `package.json` `eslintConfig` populated in a project, the following error is thrown:

```
Oops! Something went wrong! :(

ESLint: 9.0.0

Error: Could not find config file.
    at locateConfigFileToUse (/Users/ryan/git/architect/architect/node_modules/eslint/lib/eslint/eslint.js:349:21)
    at async calculateConfigArray (/Users/ryan/git/architect/architect/node_modules/eslint/lib/eslint/eslint.js:384:49)
    at async ESLint.lintFiles (/Users/ryan/git/architect/architect/node_modules/eslint/lib/eslint/eslint.js:814:25)
    at async Object.execute (/Users/ryan/git/architect/architect/node_modules/eslint/lib/cli.js:461:23)
    at async main (/Users/ryan/git/architect/architect/node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint.js:165:22)
```

This is, as far as I can tell, an unexpected and undocumented breaking change. We have dozens of repos that rely on `eslintConfig.extends` to point to our shared eslint configuration.

### What did you expect to happen?

Based on the [v9 migration doc](https://eslint.org/docs/latest/use/migrate-to-9.0.0), [flat config rollout plans](https://eslint.org/blog/2023/10/flat-config-rollout-plans/), [announcement post](https://eslint.org/blog/2024/04/eslint-v9.0.0-released), and other documentation, we expected package.json-based configuration to continue working as it had until v9, as no indication was provided that that configuration venue would entirely cease to work.

### What actually happened?

See above for error.

### Link to Minimal Reproducible Example

https://github.com/ryanblock/eslint-v9-package.json-config
